name: Block Run 3d Mobile
description:
This is the mobile version of the game that I have made earlier for pc so if you have an android you can download it and play it for free 

it is a Rage game you will Rage while playing this game.

There are currently only 3 levels and if you are able to complete all three of them then you are a pro gamer 

Warning!!

This game can only be completed by pro gamers and if you are not a pro gamer thhen also you can try it.
